title: A proclamation by Marie R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Requires all subjects to apprehend several dozen people on the charges of treason.
At head of title: By the King and Queen.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the ninth day of May, 1692.
